items.content_html: PDFEmbedJS is a lightweight, easy-to-use JavaScript library for embedding PDF documents into web pages. It provides seamless integration of PDFs with support for navigation, zooming, and asynchronous loading, enhancing the user's interaction with PDFs in web applications.

It provides seamless integration of PDFs with support for navigation, zooming, and asynchronous loading, enhancing the user's interaction with PDFs in web applications.
